roleset.name: to walk or move quietly on one's toes
roleset.note: TIPTOE-V NOTES: frame created by Olga. Member of Vncls run-51.3.2. (from tiptoe.01-v)
TIPTOEING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, tiptoe-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls run-51.3.2. (from tiptoeing.01-n)

example.name: with direction
example.text: Small investors have tiptoed back into the market following Black Monday , but mostly through mutual funds .

example.name: Arg0 with DIR
example.text: I don't agree with his tiptoeing around the issue, but he does have to "play the game".
